header_text: Your coworker asks you about your social media accounts. You don't like social media and have chosen not to have any accounts. Your coworker will think that you are wise.

elements.Text: Does your coworker think it's fine that you don't have social media?

elements.name: Your coworker asks you about your social media accounts. You don't like social media and have chosen not to have any accounts. Your coworker will think that you are wise._Social Situations_comp_question
